name: George Pontos: The Stolen Lyre
summary: In this action dangerous dungeons platformer game you are on a quest to find the lost instrument lyra. However, when George is on his way to find the instrument he is met by obstacles and bunch of crazy barbarians and other deadly dangers in this classic platform game. You don't always have to kill your enemies, you can also avoid them to save your dynamite and ammo. You have to be careful, you are in a world dangerous and spears are shot from some dungeons platforms.
